service.tut.pori.contentanalysis

Class AssociationDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.dao.SQLDAO
      • service.tut.pori.contentanalysis.AssociationDAO

  • public class AssociationDAO
extends SQLDAO
    Used to associate media objects to photos. Note that even though it is possible to retrieve an instance of this class through DAOHandler, it is not recommended to use this DAO to directly modify media object relations. An attempt to do so may cause undefined behavior.

      • deassociate

        public void deassociate(java.lang.String guid,
                        java.lang.String mediaObjectId)
        GUID and/or mediaObjectId must be given.
        Parameters:
        guid - if null, the associations between the given mediaObjectId and ANY GUID will be removed
        mediaObjectId - if null, the associations between the given GUID and ANY mediaObjectId will be removed

      • getAssociationsForGUIDs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getAssociationsForGUIDs(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> guids)
        Parameters:
        guids -
        Returns:
        GUID-mediaobject id relation map or null if none found or if guids was null or empty

      • getAssociationsForMediaObjectIds

        Parameters:
        mediaObjectIds -
        Returns:
        guid-media object map or null if no associations found
